attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We wish it introduced that a party successor can not be appointed as prime minister  without being elected by the people of the Country. If they are appointed in house  they then must hold an election within 6 months of their appointment. A general election will be automatic if they fail to comply

rejection.details: Your petition is very similar to an existing petition and you may wish to sign this instead: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/InterimElection/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
